name: Polar night
description:
Artwork from the series "Arctic Fox year" / "Polarity_first touch" exhibition
This project is the first contact with the universe of Polarity and the continuation of the artists' thoughts about the poles of cold. It combines the study of all aspects of human interaction with the Arctic and Antarctic using a variety of tools: digital art, classical media, art history and literary experiences

Artist: Daria Panfilova
Music: R0##!
